name: Gravity went boom!
description:
Use ARROWS to move and SPACE to jump!

We participated in the Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam!

In this prototype platformer, you use different gravity areas to reach your objective(apparently you LOVE very passionately white rectangles).

We had planned much more emphasis on the "out of control" theme with the gravity areas, but we ran out of time. We'd love to show more capabilities for the design in a future build.
